knimeNode.name: TensorFlow Network Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes a TensorFlow network to a file.

fullDescription.intro: Writes a TensorFlow network to a file or directory.
fullDescription.option:
The writer to use.
TensorFlow SavedModel ZIP Writer: Writes a TensorFlow model as a SavedModel which is compressed to a ZIP file.
See ' Structure of a SavedModel directory ' for information on SavedModels.
The location of the output file. KNIME URLs like "knime://knime.workflow/ ... <filename>" are supported.
